language.name: English
cyan.error.notOp: §cYou don't have the required permission to do that
cyan.error.fileNotRemoved: §cAn error occurred while trying to remove the locations file
cyan.error.playerOnlyCmd: §cThis command can only be executed by a player
cyan.error.locationAlreadyExists: §cA location with this name already exists
cyan.error.locationNotFound: §cThe location %s §cdoesn't exist (check if you spelled it correctly)
cyan.error.noLastPos: §cYour last death location was not saved
cyan.error.bedNotFound: §cYou don't have an attributed bed or respawn anchor
cyan.error.playerNotFound: §cPlayer not found. The player must be online
cyan.error.notEnoughXp: §cYou don't have enough XP (%s §clevels are required)
cyan.msg.bed: §3You have been teleported to your bed
cyan.msg.respawnAnchor: §3You have been teleported to your respawn anchor
cyan.msg.surface: §3You have been teleported to the surface
cyan.msg.kgir: §3Ground items have been removed in a radius of %s §3chunks
cyan.msg.backTp: §3You have been teleported to the place you died
cyan.msg.tpaRequestSend: Your tpa request have been send
cyan.msg.listRequestingPlayers: The players that requested to teleport to you are :
cyan.msg.noRequestingPlayers: No player requested to teleport to you
cyan.msg.notEnoughXpTpa: You don't have enough XP to be teleported to %s
cyan.msg.tpaRequest:
§6%s§r has requested to teleport to you.
Enter '§a/tpaAccept <playerName>' §rto accept or '§a/tpaRefuse <playerName>' §rto refuse
cyan.msg.tpaAlreadyRequested: §cYou already send a request to this player
cyan.msg.set.minOpLvlKgi: §3The minimum OP level to execute §d/kgi §3is now %s
cyan.msg.set.minOpLvlEditLocation: §3The minimum OP level to edit locations is now %s
cyan.msg.set.daysToRemoveBackTp: §3The number of days to keep the last death locations is now %s
cyan.msg.set.useXpToTeleport: §3Toggled the use of XP to teleport %s
cyan.msg.set.blocksPerXpLevelBed: §3The number of blocks to consume 1 XP level for /bed is now %s
cyan.msg.set.blocksPerXpLevelSurface: §3The number of blocks to consume 1 XP level for /surface is now %s
cyan.msg.set.blocksPerXpLevelTpa: §3The number of blocks to consume 1 XP level for /tpa is now %s
cyan.msg.getDesc.bed: §3The §d/bed §3command teleports you to your bed or respawn anchor
cyan.msg.getDesc.kgi:
§3The §d/kgi §3command kills every item that is on the ground in a specific radius.
§d - /kgi §3to kill items in the default radius (defined in the config, can be changed).
§d - /kgi [distance_in_chunks] §3to kill items in the specified radius
cyan.msg.getDesc.surface: §3The §d/surface §3command teleports you to the highest block located at your position
cyan.msg.getDesc.back: §3The §d/back §3command teleports you to the last place you died
cyan.msg.getDesc.location: §3The §d/location <location_name> §3command teleports you to the given location (created by a player before)
cyan.msg.getDesc.useCustomTranslations: §3The §euseTranslations §3option toggles the use of custom translations
cyan.msg.getDesc.distanceToEntitiesKgi: §3The §edistanceToEntitiesKgi §3option defines distance (in chunks) in which the ground items will be removed
cyan.msg.getDesc.minOpLvlKgi: §3The §eminOpLvlKgi §3option defines the required OP level to use the §d/kgi §3command
cyan.msg.getDesc.minOpLvlEditLocation: §3The §eminOpLvlEditLocation §3determines the minimum OP level required to edit locations
cyan.msg.getDesc.daysToRemoveBackTp: §3The §edaysToRemoveBackTp §3option defines the number of days the last death location of a player is kept
cyan.msg.getDesc.useXpToTeleport: §3The §euseXpToTeleport §3option defines whether XP is required to use teleportation commands such as /bed, /surface or /tpa
cyan.msg.getDesc.blocksPerXpLevelBed: §3The §eblocksPerXpLevelTpa §3option defines the how many blocks will consume 1 level when using the /bed command (iff the §euseXpToTeleport §3is set to true)
cyan.msg.getDesc.blocksPerXpLevelSurface: §3The §eblocksPerXpLevelTpa §3option defines the how many blocks will consume 1 level when using the /surface command (iff the §euseXpToTeleport §3is set to true)
cyan.msg.getDesc.blocksPerXpLevelTpa: §3The §eblocksPerXpLevelTpa §3option defines the how many blocks will consume 1 level when using the /tpa command (iff the §euseXpToTeleport §3is set to true)
cyan.msg.getCfg.blocksPerXpLevelBed: §6- §3Blocks per 1 XP level for bed tp: %s
cyan.msg.getCfg.blocksPerXpLevelSurface: §6- §3Blocks per 1 XP level for surface tp: %s
cyan.msg.optionNotFound: §cThis option does not exist or you tried to set it to the wrong type of value (int or bool)
cyan.msg.wrongType: §cThis option can only be set to the %s §ctype
cyan.msg.rule.opLevels: §cThe OP level must be between 0 and 4 (both included)
cyan.screen.options.title: Cyan Options
